channel.title: Postgres Changelog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Postgres.app 2.1.6
item.description:
This is the February 2019 quarterly update for PostgreSQL.

  • PostgreSQL 10.7 with PostGIS 2.4.6
  • PostgreSQL 9.6.12 with PostGIS 2.3.8
  • PostgreSQL 9.5.16 with PostGIS 2.2.8

PostgreSQL 11.2 is available with Postgres.app 2.2.2 and can be download from postgresapp.com/downloads.html
